metadata.description:
I'm a dreamer and an adventurer. I've travelled the world, shared stages with my all time favourite bands, and met countless beautiful souls along the way. I am immensely grateful for that. Yet, such blessings come with sacrifices...

"Bella" delves on the heart-wrenching emotions that arise when you feel someone you hold dear slipping away—a bond that, deep down, you know is destined to end.

Drawing from personal experience, this song embodies the difficult crossroads I encountered when my relentless pursuit of music forced me to choose between love and my dreams.

Following a life-changing year and the successes of my sold out Music NFTs, including my 888 Love Letters, I am thrilled to release "Bella" as a digital treasure, making it more accessible to my devoted community on this unique occasion.

Don't forget to "leave me a note" xxx

Written by Josh Savage.
Produced by Jonathan Kluth in Berlin.

lyrics.text:
I’m restless
Tired to my bones
I’ve grown artless
Oh let me make mistakes
Let me make mistakes

I’m reckless
I’m giving it my all
And time’s precious
These dreams take control
Oh it’s all I know

Bella my heart and soul left long ago
Bella when you finally leave me and go
Leave me a note

I’m not heartless
I’m an honest soul
Somewhat tactless
Yeah these dreams take control
Oh it’s all I know

Bella my heart and soul left long ago
Bella when you finally leave me and go
Leave me a note

Or I’ll never know
I’ll never know
I’ll never know
Leave me a note

metadata.name: Bella #1
metadata.title: Bella
